items.title: test Deep panel flow inference paper published on IJGIS
items.description: Test GeoDI lab's recent research article, introducing a gravity-informed Deep Spatial Evolution Network (DSEN) to infer panel spatial flows, has now been published in the International Journal of Geographi...

items.title: The Weather-Informed Mobility Network (WIMN) paper is published on IJGIS
items.description: Our recent research article regarding the Weather-Informed Mobility Network (WIMN), a graph deep learning framework for modeling post-snowfall human mobility networks, has now been published on the In...

items.title: The new "visitor-census" article is published on Scientific Data
items.description: A recent research article introducing a visitor-enriched census that incorporates human visitations extracted from large-scale mobile positioning data has now been published on Scientific Data.
